KUMANDA MASTER SYSTEM - QUICK START
====================================

FIRST TIME SETUP (run once):
----------------------------
sudo ./install.sh


TO RUN THE SYSTEM:
------------------
xhost +local:root
sudo python3 master.py


OR USE THE HELPER SCRIPT:
-------------------------
./start.sh


WIFI SSID: CaptivePortal
PORTAL URL: http://192.168.4.1
